body.p: The Environment is a target where the application is deployed. Click the Environments tab to see the list of available environments.

ol.li:
Select your technology.
Use CloudFoundry: Deploys the application to a Cloud Foundry endpoint.
Use Docker: Builds the application and pushes the image to a public or private DockerHub repository.
Use Lattice: Deploys the application to a simplified container cluster.

Provide the required credentials.
For Cloud Foundry, provide the Helion Cloud Foundry URL and the username and password for logging in and then click Connect.
For Docker Hub: doesn't seem functional yet.
For Lattice: doesn't seem functional yet.

Define the environment.
Select the target Organization. If the target Organization does not appear in the list, you may have to create it.
Select the target Space. If the target Space does not appear in the list, you may have to create it.
Provide a unique, descriptive name for this environment.
Click Save.
Your new environment will now appear in the list.
